players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.

You: "Only 4 players, 1 mafioso total. Diana (villager) is dead, so among Bob/Charlie/Detective there’s 1 mafioso. Detective: please claim if you have a guilty; otherwise stay hidden. Bob, Charlie: where were your heads last night?"
Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso. I investigated him last night. I’m the detective. Please vote Bob."

Bob: "Charlie is fake-claiming. With only 4 players, a real detective wouldn’t hard-claim Day 1 unless certain; he’s rushing a mislynch. Alice, think: why would I kill Diana instead of the detective if I were mafia?"

Charlie: "Bob is lying. Mafia didn’t know my identity N1; he couldn’t target me. I outed because with 1 mafia, a guilty wins the game. Alice, if I’m mafia fake-claiming, Bob flips town and I instantly lose. Vote Bob."

Bob: "Charlie’s story has holes. If he’s real, he should welcome a no-claim from Alice and let votes speak—yet he’s tunneling me and rushing. Alice, ask yourself: why would I kill Diana over a random if I feared a cop?"
You: "Both of you: lock your claims now. Charlie, confirm you’re the detective and your result is Bob=mafia. Bob, state explicitly: are you vanilla town? Also, who would you vote today and why?"
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob

Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
